parameters.name: ShareId
parameters.description: The ID associated with the share.

parameters.name: WorkloadId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: PermissionType
parameters.description: Permission granted on a share request.
